title: Caught Offside: Tuchel out and Champions League recap
description:
Old Andy saw it coming: Thomas Tuchel is out at Chelsea. The boys look at the factors that led to his dismissal and discuss where Chelsea go from here. 
We recap a busy week of Champions League football including Liverpool's collapse in Naples. Plus, Arsenal, Man United and JJ goes down the VAR conspiracy rabbit hole. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Caught Offside: Did Chelsea get it right in deciding to sack Tuchel?
